sense.def:
To have an interest in something
pomeni želeti izvedeti ali slišati več o nečem.

seg.quote: None of them had the slightest interest in music.
Brody was beginning to lose interest.

sense.def:
One's interests
so stvari, ki jih z veseljem delamo.

seg.quote: He had two consuming interests: rowing and polo.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
interests someone
, si nekdo želi izvedeti več o nečem ali se s tistim še naprej ukvarjati.

seg.quote: Young men should always look for work which interests them.

sense.def:
To interest someone in something
pomeni nekoga pregovoriti, naj nekaj stori ali kupi.

seg.quote: Can I interest you in yet another horror movie?

sense.def:
To have an interest in something being done
pomeni želeti, da bi bilo nekaj storjeno, ker bomo imeli od tega korist.

seg.quote: They had no interest in the overthrow of the established order.
They would protect the interests of their members.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in the interests of a person or group
, na določen način koristi neki osebi ali skupini.

seg.quote: It is not in the interests of any of us to have a weak government.

sense.def:
To have interests in a particular type of business
pomeni imeti v lasti podjetja določene vrste ali njihove delnice.

seg.quote: ...an industrialist with business interests in Germany.

sense.def:
Interest
je denar, ki ga prejmemo, če smo vložili določen znesek denarja, ali denar, ki ga plačamo, če smo si denar sposodili.

seg.quote: ...the interest you pay on your mortgage.
